Issue.creator: awjh-ibm
Issue.summary: As a typescript developer I can use object and any as types
Issue.description: Currently if the type of property or param is object the generation of metadata fails as it defines the element as being of type $ref: '/components/schemas/object' which is undefined. Same style error for for 'any'. Ideally it would just give the field a type of object with no params and allow additional params to match typescript.
